short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform online information on cyber threats into AI-structured and STIX 2.1 compatible data to freely embed in your security tools

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Please note: This extension does not include a license to the OpenAI API that is required to identify Entities. See https://openai.com/pricing for obtaining a license.*

EclecticIQ Threat Scout is the only browser extension that utilizes OpenAI's NLP technology and powerful regex to seamlessly convert online information on the latest cyber threats into comprehensive, structured STIX 2.1 threat data you can freely embed in your security tools. Its built-in editor empowers analysts to validate and override AI-extracted data, reducing unnecessary noise and enables selection and categorization for more effective workflow. Simply installable from browser stores with point-and-click integration, no IT support, no purchase or additional software license from EclecticIQâ€™s other products is required, ensuring seamless and efficient threat intelligence sharing across any security tooling ecosystem.
 
Features:
- Effortlessly scan and analyze webpages and online PDF, TXT and DOC documents inside your browser.
- Discover STIX 2.1 compatible Entities using cutting-edge NLP from OpenAI*
- Manually verify identified Entities and override any incorrect types with ease for more accuracy.
- Extract Cyber Observables using powerful predefined regular expressions.
- Meticulously filter and group identified threat data, enabling the selection of specific types or individual objects for focused action.
- Easily export STIX 2.1 compatible threat data in structured CSV format for further mapping, analysis and actioning inside your tooling.
 
Exclusive features for EclecticIQ Intelligence Center users:
- Automatically lookup Entities & Observables in your EclecticIQ Intelligence Center instance.
- See matches highlighted on-page with rich contextual information from your Intelligence Center instance.
- Ingest scanned documents as a Report Entity including all or a selection of identified data into your EclecticIQ Intelligence Center instance.
- Define title, TLP, or tags to be added upon ingestion to control the workflow.
 
These exclusive features only work for users running Intelligence Center 3.0 or higher. To learn more about EclecticIQ Intelligence Center please visit: eclecticiq.com/products/intelligence-center
 
Please note:
* By downloading and installing EclecticIQ Threat Scout, you agree to be bound by our Terms of Use http://www.eclecticiq.com/products/threat-scout/terms-of-use. These terms govern your use of the browser extension, including any updates and services provided through it. Please read these terms carefully before proceeding with the download and installation. Your continued use of the extension indicates your acceptance of these terms. If you do not agree to the terms, please do not download or use the browser extension.
